N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4212.9 - Eligible commercial revitalization project costs

State Regulations

Commercial revitalization project grants may be used to
defray only the following costs ("eligible project costs") and no other costs
of participating owners and/or tenants: (a) labor, materials and other construction
and renovation costs for eligible building facade improvements. For purposes of
this Part, the term eligible building facade improvements shall mean: (1)
selected masonry repairs; (2)
cleaning and repainting; (3)
new awnings and signage; (4)
wall repairs; (5)
storefront door and window repairs or
replacement; (6)
security
grills/roll-down gates; (7)
street-front lighting (signage and building); (8)
repair or replacement of visible roofing; and
(9)
installation of selected
public and private amenities; (b) fees for architectural services rendered
by an architect selected in accordance with the provisions of section
4212.12
(c) of
this Part, in connection with the planning and design of eligible building
facade improvements. Notes
